newsitem.title: USA: Conrail says will review Norfolk offer.
newsitem.headline: Conrail says will review Norfolk offer.

text.p: Conrail Inc said on Wednesday that it will review the unsolicited tender offer from Norfolk Southern Corp and it has advised shareholders to await the board's response before taking any action.
Norfolk Southern Corp has announced it will offer $100 per share for Conrail, challenging an earlier bid for the company by CSX Corp.

Conrail said that its board had already carefully considered the relative merits of a merger with Norfolk Southern and had unanimously decided that the CSX merger was in the best interests of Conrail and its constituents.
Earlier, Norfolk said its all-cash offer represents a premium of $11.49 per share, or 13 percent, over the blended value of CSX's 40 percent cash and 60 percent stock proposal.
CSX announced its deal with Conrail on October 15.
Shares of Conrail soared in early afternoon trade, rising 11-7/8 to 96-3/8.
